


# Visualisation

## tSNE
```{r fig.height = 6, fig.width = 9}

g <- ggplot(data.frame(trainParkresClass@metaData), 
       aes(x = tSNE1, y = tSNE2, color = trainParkresClass@cellTypeTrain)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_colour_tableau(palette = "Tableau 20") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = NA, 
                                    size = 1.2)) +
  labs(title = "Park et al.")
ggplotly(g)
```


## Cell Type Tree

```{r}
plotCellTypeTree(trainParkresClass@cellTypeTree, group_level = 3)
```

## Reference

Park, J. et al., 2018. Single-cell transcriptomics of the mouse kidney reveals potential cellular targets of kidney disease. Science.
